evidence_in_dialogue: [[Brass]] dr clark and his 'steady hand' haven't been seen or heard from since, so you don't have to be a brain surgeon to guess what I'm thinking
[[Warrick]] i think i found the victim's internal organs
[[Sara]] lucky for us ... we got a skin tag
[[Catherine]] i think the butcher was a doctor
[[Grissom]] finasteride, the chemical name for propecia

case_summary: Debbie Marlin and Michael Clark murders
